name: DeathScreenTweaks
description: Various tweaks to the "New Best" screen. (Formerly DisturbingNewBests.)

checkJustDont.name: Run "Just Dont"/"Do Not..." Check
checkJustDont.description:
<cp>REQUIRES GAME RESTART TO APPLY.</c>

When Geometry Dash opens, automatically check if the "Just Dont"/"Do Not..." setting is enabled.

<cy>This setting is for the slim minority of users who don't have the "Just Dont"/"Do Not..." option enabled in GD's settings. This setting is disabled by default and the check only runs once per game session on the main menu.</c>

custom.name: Include Custom Messages
custom.description:
<cp>REQUIRES GAME RESTART TO APPLY.</c>

Includes your own custom "New Best" text.
Please edit the "custom.txt" file by opening this mod's config directory (look for the golden pencil button at the bottom left of the mod's introductory screen).

brandonRogers.name: Include Brandon Rogers (READ!)
brandonRogers.description:
<cp>REQUIRES GAME RESTART TO APPLY.</c>

Includes quotes from YouTube comedian Brandon Rogers.
<cr>WARNING: Brandon Rogers' humor may not be for everyone.</c>
<cy>By enabling this option, you agree to hold harmless the mod developer (RayDeeUx) or any lead developer of Geode and assume all responsibility for any resulting damages, including damages to your emotions, ego, self-esteem, or moral compass.</c>

<cr>This is your only warning.</c>

lineWrapping.name: Linewrapping
lineWrapping.description:
Allows linewrapping for all "New Best" death messages.

Useful for anyone who wants incredibly long (but still legible) death messages.

Disabling this option will ignore whatever value you have set for the "'New Best' Text Max Scale" setting below.

maxScale.name: "New Best" Text Max Scale
maxScale.description:
Sets the max scale of all "New Best" death messages.

(The "Linewrapping" setting above needs to be enabled for this setting to apply.)

currencyLayer.name: Hide Reward Animations
currencyLayer.description: Hides the reward animation you get when getting a new best on a rated level.

noVisibleNewBest.name: Hide "New Best" Screen
noVisibleNewBest.description:
<cl>Original idea by VolcaroCham.</c>

Hides the "New Best" screen when getting a new best.

Not sure why anyone would willingly enable this, but now the option exists in this mod. Have fun.

issues.info: To disable hyphen prefixes and suffixes in custom messages, edit saved.json. For other issues, ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
